p.span: Meal Service:Free Student Meals Serviceis availableon Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays, from 9 a.m. to Noon, at EHS, WHS & CRIS. (Posted April 17, 2020, 6:57PM)

a.title: Go to comments for Student Meal Service Change

p.span: Emergency Student Meals Hotline:570-839-7121, ext. 10165 and leave a message if you no longer have meals for your children & transportation to pick up meals.

a.title: Go to comments for New Emergency Meals Hotline

p.span: ChromeBooks: Requests for ChromeBooks should be sent by email to school principals. (Posted April 1, 2020, 2:30 AM)

a.title: Go to comments for ChromeBooks

p.span: PMSD ALERT: All PMSD schools will beclosed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year due to COVID-19. Online classes continue for all students. (Updated April 10, 2020,2:05 AM)

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 School Closures

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.span: Underway:Contact the Student RegistrationCenter at (570) 839-7121 ext. 40400to schedule an appointment. Children must be 5 years oldon or before September 1, to attend Kindergarten.Click here for more information.

a.title: Go to comments for Register Children Now for Full-Day Kindergarten Program

p.span: Blue Ridge Cable Announces New Coronavirus Learn From Home Initiative with 2 Months Free Service Click HERE for more information.

Atlantic Broadband Internet Assist: Atlantic Broadband has introduced Atlantic Broadband Internet Assist for a limited time for residents in need in its service areas who do not presently have internet with Atlantic Broadband. The new 15 x 1 Mbps service will be offered free for 60 days. Click HERE for more information.

a.title: Go to comments for Internet Service

span.p: NEW -CORONAVIRUS Updates:PMSD parents can get the latestnews on the COVID-19; CDC/DOH Guidelines, Fact Sheets & Resources; and Links toCDC/DOD Daily Updates & Breaking News on PMSD's COVID-19 Webpage - Click HERE.

a.title: Go to comments for New COVID-19 Section

strong.a: Link to PMSD Board of School Directors' Adjudication regarding the 2019 Charter School Application filed by the Pocono Charter High School for the Performing and Visual Arts

a.title: Go to comments for Charter School Adjudications

p.span: Charter School Frequently Asked Questions: PMSD is receiving many questions from community members regarding charter schools. To assist community members in gaining access to accurate information quickly, the District has compiled a list of the most frequently asked questions it is receiving and answers to those questions. Click HERE for more information.

a.title: Go to comments for Charter School Frequently Asked Questions

span.p: Volunteers Needed: The PM East All-Sports Booster Club is actively recruiting volunteers for the 2019-20 sports season. Any interested, should contact the East Athletic Department at 570-839-7121, ext. 80401 for more information.
